review: OK, I don't review often but NEED to do this for Fire TV. This little system comes packaged in gem worthy packaging. As only Amazon could package their products. Then, to open this nice box to find a device the size of a slice of bread AND possibly one of the most ergonomically designed remotes I have ever owned. But, don't let the size fool you! This little metal box is loaded with technology. To be able to watch all your Prime content is one thing but, to add apps, games, etc. Well. what more can I say? Perhaps to simply say, you really NEED the Amazon Fire TV.....especially if you are a Prime member. Shoot, maybe getting one will move you to become a Prime member. Just get it. You won't be sorry!
